description.value:
Tiny chips of white bone float within this dark potion, which carries the scent of beef broth.

Effect: When you drink this potion as a maneuver, you sprout 3-foot sharpened horns from your forehead. Whenever you use the Charge main action, the target of your strike is gored upon your horns and [[/apply grabbed]]. While grabbed this way, the creature is [[/apply bleeding]]. You can also grab another creature with your limbs. The horns harmlessly fall off your head at the end of the encounter.

project.prerequisites: One vial of pure bovine essence
